inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction2Label: Bring your vaild government issued IDto the store
inStorePickupLabel.readyToPickupOnHintText: You have until {date} to pick up your order.If you do not pick up your order by that date,it will be cancelled.
inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction1Label: Before going to the store,wait for anemail confirming it's ready
inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction3Label: Bring this confirmation email or yourorder number with you

errorMsg.weDidNotFindOrderText: Sorry, we did not find any orders with the given Order Number and ZIP Code. Please contact Customer Care Live Chat or 1-888-922-2236 for help

cms.ordersOlderText: For orders older than the 12 months, please contact Customer Care
cms.noOrderText: There are no orders associated with this account.
cms.contactCustomerCareMessage: If you can't find your order, contact Customer Care
cms.pickOrderMessage: You have until {{date}} to pick up your order.
cms.ifYouDontPickupText: If you do not pick up your order by that date, it will be cancelled
cms.contactCustomerCareTextReturn: Please contact Customer Care to return this item
cms.noteText: After your item is ready for pickup, it will be held in our store for 7 days.
cms.pleaseSelectReasonText: Please select a reason and quantity to continue.
cms.cannotReturnText: You cannot return or exchange this as the 30 day return period has expired.
cms.yourRefundInformation: Your refund will be initiated after recieving the return packages. The amount will be refunded back to the payment method usedto place this order. Once we process your return, it may take up to 5-7 businessdays to return money to your account. Inquire with your bank for more information.
cms.returnSummaryText: Here is your returns summary. Your return hasbeen processed. Please print the return shipping label and send the package back.
cms.orderCancellationRequestText: Your order cancellation request has been received
cms.confirmationMailText: Your confirmation mail is on its way.
cms.cancellationInfoMessage: Once we process your cancellation, it may takeup to 5-7 business days to return money to your account. Inquire with your bank for more information.
cms.giftCardMessage: Please keep your physical gift card for future reference to assist with any returns or order cancellations.
cms.cancelOrderConfirmationMessage: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO CANCEL THIS ORDER?
